Detailed Description

Quaternion representation class.

This class implements a quaternion that represents a rotation of 'theta' degrees around an axis 'dir', where: x=dir.x*sin(theta/2), y=dir.y*sin(theta/2), z=dir.z*sin(theta/2), w=cos(theta/2)
